forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this morning becoming a steady light rain during the afternoon hours. Thunder possible. High 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Thunder possible. High 46F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.
